textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: You've come across a school of minnows, and there are no \n predators in sight. Can you eat all the fish before the \n timer runs out?

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
THE FRENZY METER:
 Fill up your FRENZY METER by eating fish quickly. When
 your Frenzy meter is full, you earn double the points for
 everything you eat! To keep it full, you need to keep
 eating!
